players.name: Alice
memory: Charlie: "Alice is the mafioso. Diana was killed last night, and we must vote to arrest Alice now to protect Bob and me."
You: "Alice is not the mafioso. Charlie's accusation is baseless and seems designed to divert suspicion from the real killer."
Charlie: "Alice is lying to avoid suspicion. Diana's death and my investigation prove she's mafia. Bob, please trust me and vote to arrest Alice now."
You: "Alice is innocent and Charlie is trying to manipulate the vote by making baseless accusations. Bob, don't be fooled by Charlie's tactics."
Bob: "I will not vote to arrest Alice. I believe Charlie's accusations are unfounded and potentially misleading, as there isn't enough evidence to support his claims."
